title: Skill Frontmatter
description: Schema for SKILL.md frontmatter validation (follows Agent Skills spec: https://agenstskills.com)

name.description: Unique skill identifier. Lowercase alphanumeric with hyphens, no leading/trailing/consecutive hyphens.

description.description: What the skill does and when to use it.

license.description: License name or reference to bundled license file.

compatibility.description: Environment requirements (intended product, system packages, network access, etc.).

metadata.description: Arbitrary key-value mapping for additional metadata.

allowed-tools.description: Space-delimited list of pre-approved tools the skill may use (experimental).
